name: Pacifica Labs, Inc.
description: Developer of a mental health application designed to help people by giving them the most effective and empowering tools available to manage their stress and anxiety. The company's mental health application is based on Cognitive Behavioral Therapy with relaxation and wellness techniques which are distilled down into simple, quick, daily activities to provide a way for people to track their progress, helping them address stress, anxiety and depression at a gradual pace.
